attributes.action: Introduce road safety precautions for our children going to and from school
attributes.background: In the last 4 months there has been 3 school children struck by cars on woodlands crescent and we are requesting assistance in making sure our kids get to and from school safely.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because local road safety measure are a matter for local councils not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you have a concern about the situation in your local area you should consider contacting your local council.

Alternatively you could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to increase the funding it provides to council to improve road safety features near schools.
